entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
